content.question: Based on archeological records, historians argue that the Ancestral Puebloans vacated Mesa Verde due to

choices.label: dangerous mud slides that caused destruction of their dwellings
diseases brought into the area by other tribes
a series of droughts in the late thirteenth century

content.answer: a series of droughts in the late thirteenth century
